item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #460】SRE周刊＃460
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, incident.io: See how Netflix scaled their incident management with incident.io. By leveraging intuitive tools like Catalog and Workflows, they built a streamlined, scalable process that empowers teams to handle incidents with ease and consistency—even at Netflix’s scale. https://incident.io/customers/netflix An Incident Review of an Incident Review So I […]】在sreweekly.com上查看我们的赞助商Insped.io中的一条消息：请参阅Netflix如何通过ISCOST.IO缩放其事件管理。通过利用目录和工作流程等直观工具，他们构建了一个简化的可扩展过程，该过程使团队能够轻松且一致地处理事件，即使是Netflix的规模也是如此。 https://incident.io/customers/netflix事件审查的事件评论，我[…]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #463】SRE周刊＃463
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, incident.io: Incidents move fast—so should your response. See how we’re doing it, the challenges faced, and what else is on the AI roadmap. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rNpwZPOUhuE Probabilistic Increment Sometimes, we can harness randomness to […]】在Sreweekly.com上查看我们的赞助商Actist.IO的消息：事件快速移动 - 因此您的响应应该。这就是为什么我们正在建立一个像您的团队一样思考的AI响应者，而不是机器。看看我们如何做到这一点，面临的挑战以及AI路线图上还有什么。 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rnpwzpouhue概率增量有时，我们可以将随机性放在[…]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #462】SRE周刊＃462
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, incident.io: On-call shouldn’t feel like a nightmare. With incident.io, you get clear ownership, seamless escalations, and insights that actually help—so you can fix issues fast and get back to what matters. No chaos, just smooth operations. https://go.incident.io/on-call-as-it-should-be The non-existence of ACID consistency – Part 1 This article […]】在Sreweekly.com上查看我们的赞助商Insped.io的消息：呼叫不应该像一场噩梦。有了Invist.io，您将获得清晰的所有权，无缝升级和实际帮助的见解 - 因此，您可以快速解决问题并回到重要的问题上。没有混乱，只有平稳的操作。 https://go.incident.io/on-call-as-it-shound-不存在酸一致性 - 第1部分本文[…]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #464】SRE周刊＃464
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, incident.io: For years, on-call has felt more like a burden than a solution. But modern teams are making a change. On Feb 26 at 1 PM EST, hear why—and how—they’re moving from PagerDuty to incident.io On-call. Register now. https://go.incident.io/events/migrating-from-pagerduty So You Want to Build Your Own Data […]】在Sreweekly.com上查看我们的赞助商Actist.io的信息：多年来，待命更像是负担，而不是解决方案。但是现代团队正在做出改变。在美国东部时间下午1点2月26日，听取为什么（以及如何）从Pagerduty转移到Issed.io。立即注册。 https://go.incident.io/events/migrating-from-pagerduty，因此您想构建自己的数据[…]

item.title: 【SRE Weekly Issue #461】SRE周刊＃461
item.description: 【View on sreweekly.com A message from our sponsor, incident.io: Effective incident management demands coordination and collaboration to minimize disruptions. This guide by incident.io covers the full incident lifecycle—from preparation to improvement—emphasizing teamwork beyond engineering. By engineers, for engineers. https://incident.io/guide The importance of resilience engineering Written in 2020 after an AWS outage, this article analyzes dependence […]】在Sreweekly.com上查看我们的赞助商Insped.io的消息：有效的事件管理要求协调和协作以最大程度地减少干扰。该指南逐个指南。IO涵盖了整个事件生命周期（从准备到改进），强调了工程以外的团队合作。工程师，工程师。 https://incident.io/guide在AWS中断后在2020年撰写的弹性工程的重要性，本文分析了依赖[…]
